name: taurus
content:

a constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a bull (= a male cow): The Pleiades are a little cluster of stars in the constellation of Taurus.
[ C or U ] the second sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 21 April to 22 May, represented by a bull, or a person born during this period: Born in May, his zodiac sign is Taurus. Laura is a Taurus.
More examplesFewer examplesThe evening star Venus blazes in the west to the right of the star Aldebaran in Taurus.The moon passes across the northern edge of the sparkling Hyades star cluster in Taurus.I'm a Taurus, an earth sign, so I love earthy smells and colours.Both sisters come under the star sign of Taurus.
